title: Plz help
comment: It selects the folder .. but how to start the conversion??? It doesn't respond when I click the convert tab.. plz help

There are two way:
1) Open ePUBator, tap on Convert, select the PDF file and the conversion starts.
2) Open the PDF file in a file manager using ePUBator and the conversion starts.

title: Crash and burn
comment: This app has yet to work for converting a pdf to epub for me. App stops working and fails everytime. And I need this specific pdf converted. I'm not going g to try another one if I need this specific one converted.

On some files the text extraction fails (crash or unreadable epub) and you have to try another pdf. :-{
 PS: On kitkat the PDF file must be on internal memory, not on sdcard!

If you need a specific pdf maybe you can try calibre or an online converter, but a star for a single try is undeserved.
bye

title: Please remove open with epubator
comment: It opens all the pdfs and there are problems with ones with charts and pictures. EDIT: thanks. Problem solved.

If you have set ePUBator as preferred app for open PDF files, you have to go on Settings - Apps, then select ePUBator and tap on Clear Defaults. After that you can open the PDF files with another app. Bye

Preview shows only files already converted with ePUBator to check if they are readable.

To convert a PDF in ePUB tap on Convert, select a PDF file and, after a while, you can find the ePUB file in the same folder of PDF file.
